lines.name: AvatarHelp
lines.line: How can I help you?

branch.name: Objective
branch.text: What am I supposed to be doing again?

lines.name: Objective1
lines.line: I'm not sure what I'm supposed to be doing.

lines.name: Objective2
lines.line: This simulation is designed to ease you back into your memories.

lines.name: Objective3
lines.line: I suggest looking for some documentation, or a photograph.

branch.name: Direct
branch.text: Could you be more direct about what I can do?

lines.name: Direct1
lines.line: Could you be more direct about what I should be doing?

lines.name: Direct2
lines.line: It will be most beneficial to your recovering mind to discover your identity on your own.

lines.name: Direct3
lines.line: However, I can provide guidance in a limited capacity.

branch.name: StoolHint
branch.text: I'm still not sure where I should start.

lines.name: StoolHint1
lines.line: I'm still not sure where to begin.

lines.name: StoolHint2
lines.line: Look around everywhere, see if anything jogs your memory.

lines.name: StoolHint3
lines.line: I'd suggest taking a closer look at the stool in the corner.

branch.name: KeyHint
branch.text: Can you tell me something about how this key might be useful?

lines.name: KeyHint1
lines.line: Could you help me find what this key is for?

lines.name: KeyHint2
lines.line: There are several keyholes in this room, but not all doors will be open to you just yet.

lines.name: KeyHint3
lines.line: The shape of the key is important!

randoms.name: KeyHint3File
randoms.line: Have you tried the file cabinet?

randoms.name: KeyHint3Piggy
randoms.line: Have you tried the piggy bank?

randoms.name: KeyHint3Arcade
randoms.line: Have you tried the arcade game?

randoms.name: KeyHint3Shelf
randoms.line: Have you explored the shelf in the corner?

randoms.name: KeyHint3OpTable
randoms.line: Have you looked at the table with the mug?

branch.name: PicHint
branch.text: What can I do with this scrap of picture?

lines.name: PicHint1
lines.line: What can I do with this torn picture?

lines.name: PicHint2
lines.line: It might help you recover some of your memory if you can complete the image.

lines.name: PicHint3
lines.line: See if you can find a place it might fit in the room.

lines.name: PicHint4
lines.line: Maybe the toolbench has something to fasten it in place.

branch.name: CoinHint
branch.text: I don't have enough money for the candy machine.

lines.name: CoinHint1
lines.line: How can I find more money for the candy machine?

lines.name: CoinHint2
lines.line: This simulation seeks to restore your memory in regards to both critical and trivial patterns.

lines.name: CoinHint3
lines.line: Search somewhere you'd be likely to find loose change.

branch.name: ClockHint
branch.text: What can I do with the clock on the wall?

lines.name: ClockHint1
lines.line: What can I do with the clock on the wall?

lines.name: ClockHint2
lines.line: It needs to be set to a special time before it will ring.

lines.name: ClockHint3
lines.line: Maybe something in the room presents a relevant time.

randoms.name: ClockHint3Card
randoms.line: Have you taken a closer look at the coat on the chair?

branch.name: ArcadeHint
branch.text: I can't seem to win the arcade game.

lines.name: ArcadeHint1
lines.line: I keep losing the arcade game.

lines.name: ArcadeHint2
lines.line: Pay careful attention to the intro and game over screens.

lines.name: ArcadeHint3
lines.line: There may be different sets of rules at play.

branch.name: NeverMindHint
branch.text: Never mind, I'll figure it out on my own.

branch.name: LookCreepy
branch.text: Why do you look like that?

lines.name: LookCreepy1
lines.line: Why do you look like that?

lines.name: DisableMe
lines.line: This line should have been disabled!

lines.name: LookCreepy2
lines.line: It was determined that humans prefer an intelligent artificial interface to present itself as a partially electronic humanoid, or cyborg.

lines.name: LookCreepy3
lines.line: Various psychological theories have been suggested for this preference.

lines.name: LookCreepy4
lines.line: Personally, it's kind of creepy.

lines.name: LookCreepyExit
lines.line: Never mind.

lines.name: CardDiscuss1
lines.line: Mac Cohle.. is that me?

lines.name: CardDiscuss2
lines.line: You need to come to that conclusion on your own.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss1
lines.line: Why is the door locked?

lines.name: DoorDiscuss2
lines.line: This simulation does not extend beyond this space for now.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss3
lines.line: Should we need more information to restore your memories, we can extend the simulation.

lines.name: DoorDiscuss4
lines.line: Focus on the task at hand.

speech.line: There's a torn photograph in the file.
Default combination.. Jules birthday?
Clocks & Locks.
Nothing of note under that name.
